column3: 2015) send sympathy gifts send sympathy card kathleen johnson parkhouse bunderson passed away tuesday
column5: 2015 at her home in soda springs. memorial services will be held on tuesday
column7: 2015 at 11 a. m. at the soda springs lds stake center. family will visit with friends on tuesday morning from 9:30-10:30 a. m. at the church prior to services. interment will follow at the st. charles cemetery at 3 p. m. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2008 - 2015 sims funeral home funeral home website by batesville
